Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<Message>
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer<Message>
Controller class for MVC pattern implementation.

  • Method Details

    • removePlayer

      private void removePlayer​(Player player)
      Used to remove a Player from the turn list and from Game.
      Parameters:
      player -

    • updateTurn

      private void updateTurn()
      Method used to update the turn. The Game will notify each RemoteView with a TurnUpdateMessage.

    • getTurn

      public java.util.HashMap<Player,​java.lang.Boolean> getTurn()

    • getCards

      public java.util.Set<God> getCards()

    • performStart

      private void performStart​(PlayerSelectMessage message)
      Method used to perform a selection (the Client select one of his worker and sends a PlayerSelectMessage).
      Parameters:
      message -

    • performMove

      private void performMove​(PlayerMoveMessage message)
      Method used to perform a move if the Client has the turn. the Client select where to move and sends a PlayerMoveMessage. If it's an illegal move the Player will notify his own RemoteView an InvalidChoiceMessage. If the Player moves to a level 3 building the Game will notify each RemoteView with a WinMessage which contains the username of the winner.
      Parameters:
      message -

    • performBuild

      private void performBuild​(PlayerBuildMessage message)
      Method used to perform a build if the Client has the turn. the Client select where to build and sends a PlayerBuildMessage. If it's an illegal move the Player will notify his own RemoteView an InvalidChoiceMessage. After a "successful" build a timer will start letting the Client a time window of 5 seconds to perform an undo and return to the select phase.
      Parameters:
      message -

    • performBuildDome

      private void performBuildDome​(PlayerBuildDomeMessage message)
      Method used by God Atlas to perform a build-dome if the Client has the turn. the Client select where to build a dome and sends a PlayerBuildDomeMessage. If it's an illegal move the Player will notify his own RemoteView an InvalidChoiceMessage. After a "successful" build a timer will start letting the Client a time window of 5 seconds to perform an undo and return to the select phase.
      Parameters:
      message -

    • performEnd

      private void performEnd​(PlayerEndMessage message)
      Method used to pass the turn (finished each phase) if the Client has the turn. the Client sends a PlayerEndMessage. If it's an illegal message the Player will notify his own RemoteView an InvalidChoiceMessage.
      Parameters:
      message -

    • performUndo

      private void performUndo​(PlayerUndoMessage message)
      Method used to perform an Undo if the Client has the turn and its in the correct phase. The Client sends a PlayerEndMessage. If it cannot be performed the Player will notify his own RemoteView an InvalidChoiceMessage.
      Parameters:
      message -

    • performDeckBuilding

      private void performDeckBuilding​(PlayerDeckMessage message)
      When the Client is "challenger" he has to choose each card and sends a PlayerDeckMessage which contains each card name. If an IllegalArgumentException will be catched the Player will notify his RemoteView with a InvalidChoiceMessage. The number of cards & others exceptions (not your turn or SimpleGameException) will be catched and the Player will notify his RemoteView with a InvalidChoiceMessage.
      Parameters:
      message -

    • performCardChoice

      private void performCardChoice​(PlayerCardChoiceMessage message)
      When a Client select a card sends a PlayerCardChoiceMessage. If the turn is correct and the card is in deck list the Player will have the selected card. If exceptions NullPointerException/IllegalArgumentException / SimpleGameException / CardAlreadySetException the Player will notify his own RemoteView.
      Parameters:
      message -

    • performPawnPositioning

      private void performPawnPositioning​(PlayerPlacePawnsMessage message)
      Method used to perform a Pawn positioning on the Board of the Game. The PlayerPlacePawnsMessage contains two set of coordinates for the two Worker. The coordinates have to be correct and the Player have to have the turn or the Player will notify his RemoteView with a InvalidChoiceMessage.
      Parameters:
      message - Message

    • performPlayerRemoval

      private void performPlayerRemoval​(PlayerRemoveMessage message)
      Method used to remove a Player from the Game. The turn will be updated. If there are only one Player remaining it will be notified with a WinMessage.
      Parameters:
      message -

    • performChatUpdate

      private void performChatUpdate​(PlayerChatMessage message)
      The Game will notify each RemoteView with a ChatUpdateMessage.
      Parameters:
      message -

    • update

      public void update​(Message message)
      The SocketClientConnection notifies his Controller with the Message read on his ObjectInpuStream.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer<Message>
      Parameters:
      message -
